Author: emelinette
Text: I do this! Illness made me take much longer to graduate, so I had to sit around and watch my friends do successful life things which they’d all post these long Facebook updates about and *all* I would feel was genuine joy because I had a smaller waist

Author: x24throwaway
Text: I get the thought, “at least I’m skinnier than her” about people. E.g. my ex-best friend, I saw her social media posts about her new job and success and I just thought... well I’m skinnier so... I win?? Like that means something. I thought I was better than this too.
